targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  count(DISTINCT(meta_client_name))
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from:date:seconds})
  AND slot_start_date_time <= (toDateTime(${__to:date:seconds}) - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
LIMIT 1000

SELECT
    meta_client_geo_latitude as latitude,
    meta_client_geo_longitude as longitude,
    meta_client_geo_city as city,
    count(DISTINCT meta_client_name) as `count`
    
FROM 
    libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
    slot_start_date_time >= now() - toIntervalMinute(2)
    AND slot_start_date_time <= now() - toIntervalMinute(1)
    AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
    AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY
    slot_start_date_time,
    meta_client_geo_longitude,
    meta_client_geo_latitude,
    meta_client_geo_city
ORDER BY slot_start_date_time DESC
LIMIT 1 by latitude, longitude

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  count(DISTINCT(peer_id_unique_key))
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from:date:seconds})
  AND slot_start_date_time <= (toDateTime(${__to:date:seconds}) - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
LIMIT 1000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  count(DISTINCT(meta_client_name))
FROM libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from:date:seconds})
  AND slot_start_date_time <= (toDateTime(${__to:date:seconds}) - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code = '${geo_continent_code}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
LIMIT 1000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(propagation_slot_start_diff) max,
  quantile(0.95)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p95,
  avg(propagation_slot_start_diff) average,
  quantile(0.50)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p50,
  quantile(0.05)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p05,
  min(propagation_slot_start_diff) min
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 100000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    $timeSeries + 12000 as timestamp,
    multiply(floor(divide(propagation_slot_start_diff, $heatmap_interval)), $heatmap_interval) as diff,
    count() as count
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE $timeFilter
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 100000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries + 12000 as timestamp,
    multiply(floor(divide(propagation_slot_start_diff, $heatmap_interval)), $heatmap_interval) as diff,
    count() as count
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE $timeFilter
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 100000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(slot_start_date_time), 60) * 60) * 1000 + 12000 as timestamp,
    multiply(floor(divide(propagation_slot_start_diff, 250)), 250) as diff,
    count() as count
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(1714092003) AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(1714113603)
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 100000
  AND meta_client_name IN ('xatu-cl-mimicry-sfo3-holesky-002','xatu-cl-mimicry-syd1-holesky-002','xatu-cl-mimicry-sfo3-holesky-001','xatu-cl-mimicry-syd1-holesky-001')
  AND meta_network_name IN ('holesky')
GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  stddevPop(propagation_slot_start_diff) `std dev population`,
  quantile(0.90)(propagation_slot_start_diff) - quantile(0.10)(propagation_slot_start_diff) `p90 - p10`
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 10000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(diff) max,
  quantile(0.95)(diff) p95,
  avg(diff) average,
  quantile(0.50)(diff) p50,
  quantile(0.05)(diff) p05,
  min(diff) min
FROM (
    SELECT
        slot,
        slot_start_date_time,
        block,
        meta_network_name,
        max(propagation_slot_start_diff) - min(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS diff
    FROM libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
    WHERE
        $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
        AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
        AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
    GROUP BY slot, slot_start_date_time, block, meta_network_name
)
WHERE
  diff > 0
  AND diff < 100000
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

panels.title: Block arrival time difference between sentries (by consensus client)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  slot_start_date_time,
  count(DISTINCT(block))
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
GROUP BY slot_start_date_time
ORDER BY slot_start_date_time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(epoch)
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(slot)
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  meta_client_name as name,
  COUNT(block) as count
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
GROUP BY time, meta_client_name
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 100000

WITH 
    filtered AS (
        SELECT 
            message_size, 
            floor(message_size / 25600) * 25600 AS bucketed_bytes,
            propagation_slot_start_diff
        FROM 
            default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
        WHERE 
            slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND 
            slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime AND
            propagation_slot_start_diff < 8000 AND
            meta_client_name IN (${client_name}) AND
            meta_network_name IN (${network_name}) AND
            meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
    )
SELECT 
    bucketed_bytes,
    MAX(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS max,
    quantile(0.95)(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS p95,
    AVG(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS avg,
    quantile(0.50)(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS p50,
    quantile(0.05)(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS p05,
    MIN(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS min
FROM 
    filtered
GROUP BY 
    bucketed_bytes
ORDER BY 
    bucketed_bytes ASC;

panels.title: Block arrival time for block size (compressed, 25KiB buckets)

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
    filtered AS (
        SELECT 
            message_size, 
            floor(message_size / 102400) * 102400 AS bucketed_bytes,
            propagation_slot_start_diff
        FROM 
            default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block FINAL
        WHERE 
            slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND 
            slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime AND
            propagation_slot_start_diff < 8000 AND
            meta_client_name IN (${client_name}) AND
            meta_network_name IN (${network_name}) AND
            meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
    )
SELECT 
    bucketed_bytes,
    MAX(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS max,
    quantile(0.95)(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS p95,
    AVG(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS avg,
    quantile(0.50)(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS p50,
    quantile(0.05)(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS p05,
    MIN(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS min
FROM 
    filtered
GROUP BY 
    bucketed_bytes
ORDER BY 
    bucketed_bytes ASC;

panels.title: Block propagation for block size (100KiB buckets)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(propagation_slot_start_diff) as  max,
  quantile(0.95)(propagation_slot_start_diff) as  p95,
  avg(propagation_slot_start_diff) as average,
  quantile(0.50)(propagation_slot_start_diff) as p50,
  quantile(0.05)(propagation_slot_start_diff) as p05,
  min(propagation_slot_start_diff) as min
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND (wallclock_slot - slot) < 2
  AND isNotNull(attesting_validator_index)
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 384000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

panels.description: Similar to inclusion distance but instead of when it was included in a block, it's instead when a sentry saw a attestation and the "distance" between its target and the current slot. "0" being the attestation for the current slot, "1" being current slot - 1 etc.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDateTime(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  percent
FROM 
(
    SELECT
        slot_start_date_time,
        interval,
        round((inclusion_count / interval_total) * 100, 2) AS percent
    FROM
    (
        SELECT
            slot_start_date_time,
            interval,
            inclusion_count,
            sum(inclusion_count) OVER (PARTITION BY slot_start_date_time) AS interval_total
        FROM
        (
            SELECT
                slot_start_date_time,
                floor(divide(propagation_slot_start_diff, 12000)) as interval,
                count(DISTINCT source_root, target_root, aggregation_bits, beacon_block_root, attesting_validator_index, attesting_validator_committee_index) as inclusion_count
            FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL

            WHERE
                $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
                AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
                AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
                AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
                AND isNotNull(attesting_validator_index)
            GROUP BY
                slot_start_date_time,
                interval
            ORDER BY inclusion_count DESC
        )
    )
)
ORDER BY time ASC, percent DESC

panels.title: Attestation seen distance

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries + 12000 as timestamp,
    toUInt8(propagation_slot_start_diff / ${heatmap_interval}) * ${heatmap_interval} as diff,
    sum(toUInt16(1)) as count
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL

WHERE $timeFilter
  AND (wallclock_slot - slot) < 2
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND diff < 30000
  AND isNotNull(attesting_validator_index)

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff
    
LIMIT 10000000
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(slot_start_date_time), 12) * 12) * 1000 + 12000 as timestamp,
    toUInt8(propagation_slot_start_diff / 250) * 250 as diff,
    sum(toUInt16(1)) as count
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL

WHERE slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(1714369860) AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(1714373460)
  AND (wallclock_slot - slot) < 2
  AND meta_client_name IN ('example-instance')
  AND meta_network_name IN ('mainnet')
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN ('')
  AND diff < 30000
  AND isNotNull(attesting_validator_index)

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff
    
LIMIT 10000000

panels.description: For a given slot, what beacon block roots had attestations against them

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDateTime(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  percent
FROM 
(
  SELECT
      slot_start_date_time,
      beacon_block_root,
      round((attestation_count / beacon_block_root_total) * 100, 2) AS percent
  FROM
  (
      SELECT
          slot_start_date_time,
          beacon_block_root,
          attestation_count,
          sum(attestation_count) OVER (PARTITION BY slot_start_date_time) AS beacon_block_root_total
      FROM
      (
          SELECT
              slot_start_date_time,
              beacon_block_root,
              sum(toUInt32(1)) AS attestation_count
          FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL
          WHERE
              $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
              AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
              AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
              AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
              AND isNotNull(attesting_validator_index)
          GROUP BY
              slot_start_date_time,
              beacon_block_root
          ORDER BY attestation_count DESC
      )
  )
)
ORDER BY time ASC, percent DESC

panels.title: Attestation agreement

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  stddevPop(propagation_slot_start_diff) `std dev population`,
  quantile(0.90)(propagation_slot_start_diff) - quantile(0.10)(propagation_slot_start_diff) `p90 - p10`
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND (wallclock_slot - slot) < 2
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND isNotNull(attesting_validator_index)
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 384000
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

panels.description: The difference between when an attestation is seen by the first and last instance

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(diff) max,
  quantile(0.95)(diff) p95,
  avg(diff) average,
  quantile(0.50)(diff) p50,
  quantile(0.05)(diff) p05,
  min(diff) min
FROM (
    SELECT
        slot,
        slot_start_date_time,
        aggregation_bits,
        committee_index,
        meta_network_name,
        max(propagation_slot_start_diff) - min(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS diff,
        COUNT(*) as count
    FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL
    WHERE
        $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
        AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to:date:seconds})
        AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
        AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
        AND isNotNull(attesting_validator_index)
    GROUP BY slot, slot_start_date_time, aggregation_bits, committee_index, meta_network_name
    HAVING diff > 0 AND diff < 30000 AND count > 1
)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 100000

panels.title: Attestation propagation difference between instances

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  meta_client_name as name,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM
  default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
GROUP BY
  meta_client_name, time
ORDER BY
  meta_client_name, time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  topic_name,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM
  default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
GROUP BY
  topic_name, time
ORDER BY
  topic_name, time

SELECT
  slot_start_date_time,
  count(DISTINCT(beacon_block_root))
FROM default.libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_attestation FINAL
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
GROUP BY slot_start_date_time
ORDER BY slot_start_date_time ASC
LIMIT 10000

list.definition:
SELECT meta_network_name
FROM libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY meta_network_name
list.label: Network
list.name: network_name
list.query:
SELECT meta_network_name
FROM libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY meta_network_name

list.definition:
SELECT meta_client_name
FROM libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY meta_client_name
list.label: Sentry
list.name: client_name
list.query:
SELECT meta_client_name
FROM libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY meta_client_name

list.definition:
SELECT meta_client_geo_continent_code
FROM libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY meta_client_geo_continent_code
list.label: Continent
list.name: geo_continent_code
list.query:
SELECT meta_client_geo_continent_code
FROM libp2p_gossipsub_beacon_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY meta_client_geo_continent_code
